44.ara-name: كتاب الأمثال عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "The parable of the believer is like the plant; the wind does not stop causing it to sway, and the believer does not stop suffering trials. The parable of the hypocrite is that of a cedar tree, it does not give in until it is cut down

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي مَثَلِ الْمُؤْمِنِ الْقَارِئِ لِلْقُرْآنِ وَغَيْرِ الْقَارِئِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Parable Of The Believer Who Recites The Quran And The One Who Does Not Recite
